anomalous.E: I have an anomalous feeling of being powerless.

belie.E: Her emotional behaviour belies her gentleness.

confound.E: It confounds me how the simple solution didn't occur to me.

discern.E: The figure is discerned before getting close.

eschew.M: to not stand in the way of

exacerbate.E: The illness has exacerbated his health situation.
